nodes.text: The Cadavine sector was a sector of the galaxy located in the Outer Rim Territories. Planets in Cadavine included Zhar and Melida/Daan.

The Shadows of the Empire Sourcebook placed Dorvalla as the recently established capital of the Cadavine sector. However, the later source Darth Maul: Saboteur placed it in the Videnda sector. Leland Chee has confirmed that for the time being, the original placement in the Cadavine sector is incorrect, and the latter placement is considered canon.
